game.title: Fortedle
game.subtitle: Guess the employee of the day!
game.failedToLoad: Failed to load employees. Please refresh the page.
game.alreadyAttempted: You have already made your attempt today. Come back tomorrow for a new challenge!
game.noFunfactOrInterests: Oh no! Today's employee had nothing in Huma. What a shame!

gameStatus.usedAllGuesses: You've used all your guesses. Try again tomorrow!

rules.title: Rules
rules.howToPlayDescription: Guess the employee of the day! You have infinite attempts to figure out who the selected employee is.
rules.hintsDescription: After each guess, you'll receive hints about:
rules.departmentDescription: Whether the guessed employee is in the same department
rules.officeDescription: Whether they work in the same office location
rules.teamsDescription: Whether the guessed employee is on the same teams as the target employee
rules.ageDescription: Whether the guessed employee is older, younger, or the same age
rules.supervisorDescription: Whether the guessed employee has the same supervisor
rules.buyInterestsDescription: During the game, you can buy interests and fun facts for today's employee. This costs +2 guesses, but gives you extra hints that can help you find the correct employee.
rules.winningDescription: Win by correctly guessing the employee. The employee of the day changes daily, so come back tomorrow for a new challenge!

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.name: Name
leaderboard.noScores: No scores yet for today. Be the first to complete the challenge!

sync.title: Data Sync
sync.subtitle: Enter your Huma access token to sync employee data to the database.
sync.subtitleAuthenticated: You are logged in. Click the button below to sync employee data using your Azure AD token.
sync.tokenPlaceholder: Paste your Huma access token here (Ctrl+V or Cmd+V)...
sync.failedToGetToken: Failed to get access token. Please try logging in again.
sync.alreadySynced: Database is already synced. No action needed.
sync.step2: 2. Go to Application → Local Storage → https://fortedigital.humahr.com
sync.step4: 4. Copy the value (it may be in array format like ["token"])
sync.step5: 5. Paste it here and click "Sync Data"

employees.title: Employees
employees.failedToLoad: Failed to load employees. Please try again later.
employees.selectEmployee: Select an employee to view details

loginScreen.title: Welcome to Fortedle
loginScreen.subtitle: Please log in with your Microsoft account to access the game and leaderboard.

lottery.title: Harvest Time Tracking
lottery.description: Connect your Harvest account to view your time entries. You'll be redirected to Harvest to authorize this application.

rules.title: Weekly Lottery Rules
rules.rule1: Must have at least 8 hours logged for each day Monday-Friday
rules.rule2: All time entries for the week must be created AND updated before Friday 15:00
rules.rule3: If you are late with time entries across month change, you lose all saved tickets for that month
rules.description: Each week you meet the eligibility criteria, you earn 1 lottery ticket. The more tickets you have, the better your chances in the weekly lottery!

lottery.title: Weekly Lottery
lottery.nextLotteryDate: The next weekly lottery will be held on {{date}} at 15:00
lottery.syncError: Failed to sync tickets. Please try again.

winners.title: Winners
winners.keepUpGoodWork: Good luck next week, keep up the good work!

eligibility.entriesUpdatedAfterDeadline: Some entries were updated after Friday 15:00. Latest update: {{timestamp}}

employees.noEmployees: No employees with lottery tickets found.

luckyWheel.title: Grand Finale

luckyWheel.lockedDescription: The wheel will be available when the monthly draw is ready

timebank.title: Time Bank
timebank.connectDescription: Connect your Harvest account to view your time balance.

rules.title: Working hours, overtime, flexible working arrangements and travel time

workingHours.title: Working Hours
workingHours.coreTime: Core time is 9:00-15:00 Monday to Friday.
workingHours.regularHours: Regular working hours are 8 hours/day, 40 hours/week including lunch break.

overtime.title: Overtime
overtime.intro: At Forte, we want overtime to be used when it creates clear value — for the customer, the professional environment, colleagues, or the company as a whole. We trust that everyone makes good decisions about when overtime is necessary, in line with our shared principles of balance and responsibility.
overtime.example1: You work on a 100% billable project and also contribute to sales work, mentor roles, professional activities, or initiatives that strengthen Forte.
overtime.example2: You perform customer work beyond 100% billability, in consultation with the customer and account owner, in accordance with current agreements.
overtime.nonBillableNote: If you are not on a fully billable project, tasks beyond project work are expected to be completed within normal working hours. Should extra effort be needed, this can be agreed with your personnel manager.
overtime.compensationIntro: Overtime is work beyond regular working hours. You can choose to take overtime as salary compensation (registered in 24SO) or time off at these rates:
overtime.timeOffNote: Time off must be taken within 90 days after the overtime was earned (and by year-end at the latest). If you take time off the same week, you don't need to register it in Harvest. If you take time off later, use the "Avspasering" time code.

flextime.title: Flextime
flextime.intro: Flextime is a trust-based arrangement that provides room to adapt your workday to life outside work, and to different project commitments and work rhythms. We trust that you use flextime in a way that considers your own needs, the team's rhythm, and the customer's expectations.
flextime.practice1: Flextime is taken off 1:1 and must be used within 90 days of earning (and by year-end at the latest).
flextime.practice2: If you flex within the same week, you don't need to register it separately in Harvest.
flextime.practice3: When taking time off in another week, use the "Avspasering" time code so the weekly schedule shows 40 registered hours.
